string-array.name: stays_sunny
string-array.item: It\'s gonna stay sunny for a while, enjoy!
What a nice sunny day, and it looks like it\'s gonna stay for the day
Sun is shining, and will continue for the day

string-array.name: stays_rainy
string-array.item: No luck, it\'ll keep raining for a while
Looks like it\'s gonna be raining for the rest of the day
Hopefully you have your umbrella with you, it won\'t stop raining for a while

string-array.name: stays_cloudy
string-array.item: No luck, it\'ll keep cloudy for a while
Looks like it\'s gonna be cloudy for the rest of the day

string-array.name: stays_partlycloudy
string-array.item: No luck, it\'ll keep partly cloudy for a while
Looks like it\'s gonna be partly cloudy for the rest of the day

string-array.name: sun_to_rain
string-array.item: It\'s gonna start raining in %s
Luck is over, rain is coming in %s
Take your umbrella, it looks like it\'s gonna rain in %s

string-array.name: sun_to_partlycloudy

string-array.name: rain_to_sun
string-array.item: Nice, sun is coming back in %s
Looks promising! Sun will shine again in %s
Get ready to drop your umbrella in over %s
